synopsis.text: Alongside her peers, Nayu Hayama, a passionate middle school student, takes it upon herself to enlighten her fellow classmates about the significance of appropriate undergarments. With an uncanny ability to discern whether or not the women around her are wearing suitable underwear, Nayu feels compelled to share her extensive knowledge on the subject. In an effort to promote the importance of comfortable and well-fitting undergarments, she establishes an Underwear Club. Joined by friends with varying body types and concerns, Nayu's mission is to educate and support her schoolmates as they navigate through the challenges of adolescence and discover the perfect underwear for their individual needs.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
